about_the_game:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters.
Faced with the threat of losing her job, Lily makes her boss an offer he can't refuse: Her body in exchange for leniency.
But will her husband James support her decision?
Follow the story to find out!

GAME DESCRIPTION

Join Lily and James on their quest to spice up their marriage.

EPISODE 2

Lily was called into her boss’s office for a private meeting. It seems her recent behavior at work didn’t go unnoticed. Her coworkers complained about her revealing outfits, claiming it’s distracting and affecting productivity. Some even accused her of trying to seduce them, demanding consequences for her unprofessional behavior.

Lily explains to her boss that it’s all part of a game to spice up her marriage with James, providing evidence from their chats on her phone. However, despite understanding her situation as a man, Mr. Bones feels compelled as her employer to take measures and fire her.

Determined to keep her job at all costs, Lily makes her boss an offer he can’t possibly refuse: her body in exchange for leniency.

Will Mr. Bones accept Lily’s unconventional deal?
Will James support his wife’s actions?

Follow the story to find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. 
The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. 
All characters depicted are 18 years old and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains lesbian and straight sex scenes.

name: Cuckold Sex - Episode 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
